Blog.post: life has ups and downs, there will always be things which can be bad or good happening to anyone at any given time.....Fren just broke his forearm early in the morning so till now i only got 6 hours of sleep...going to sleep now

Today has been a great day~~!!! heheheh went to school for 20mins of lesson and that is it!!! hahaha my only lecturer that talks about sex all day...but his lecture is pretty funny....Played icehockey today and today is the semi-finals~~!! The good news is tha we won and we are in the bloody finals!!! Wooohoooo....but the sad things is i did not have a good game!!! arrgghh...what the hell the most important thing is that we won hahah....today there were a few pretty girls in the crowd...* hmmm maybe that is why i did played well * lol * There is no school tomorrow, but the sad thing is that i am going to school to study for my freaking test on sat~~!!!! TAMADE~~!!! :( hehehehe glad i caught Gin online again....ok time to go communicate with her~~~!!!!! * Wonders where is PCHK *

Today, I flunked my stupid test, all that i studied was never tested!! All the revision question that the lecturer gave was not tested! WAT THE HELL~~!!! * BURN HIS HOUSE *. However things got better after talking to Gin on Msn, so nice to catch her tonight online tonight. But somehow, it feels that my life is lacking of something. I feel so left out, so lonely. Things are just not going well...is it love that is missing? or is it friends that i am lacking? i really dun know...My knee is not getting an better too...but looking on the bright side...I got hockey again on THURSDAY~~!! WEEE~~!!!....damn i am a hockey addict...Wonder how is my PCHK doing in aus...hope everything is fine with her....And good luck for your Test GIn~~!!! * wink * time to hit back to my books again...before i fall asleep again.

13th of April another stupid day~~!! Had my stupid Power Electronics Test today, flunk it by 4% damn that teacher!!! Time not even up and he wans me to hand in, if i had that 1 min to do the last 4 questions i would have pass~~!!!! Stupid Ar*e hope he rot in hell~~!!!...Played hockey today, damn 1st time in one and a half months. Glad that i still remember how to play, however during the break i think i had just a bit too much Macdonald's hahahaha 5 mins into the game i am panting like hell...and the knee hurts again so i have to get the my friend who is backing me up to play the rest of the game. Damn we lost 9-0, and i realised that i actually know a lot of Ar*e in my life~~!! lol....Throw the blame onto other people when it is clearly their fault...Thank goodness most of my friends are not like that. Another lonely night for me again, when will i be able to get myself a gf??..* scratch head * Maybe when i succeed in dieting hahaha.....ok time to go hit the bloody books again!!! i hate Common Test Week~~!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

* Sigh * April 12th 2004. 1 1/2 months gone since i injured my bloody knee, no hockey, no sports, just sitting at the couch and training to become a couch potato. Now i am so out of shape plus i had buffet dinner!!!! And i guess i am going to eat more because STUPID COMMON TESTS are coming up!!! and the first paper is today 9 am!!!! arrgghhhhhhh * stabs myself *. But looking at the bright side, i am going to play hockey again despite doctor's order of 2 months no sports!!..what the heck...he send me for psyhio therapy which is exercise for my knee...so i dun care i am just going ahead with or without his approval.....hahhahah...worse case senario * complete tear of my meniscus & maybe some ligaments * hahahahahah got to get back to my books now....* tears rolling *

Sinful Supper Just had a very sinful supper, Macdonalds~~!!! I can really see myself getting fatter and fatter and fatter and fatter every single day. Gotta start cutting down on all this sinful meals~~!!! My freaking friends didn't call me and so the badminton was cancelled reason being he was sleeping at home hah PIG~~!! Thank Goodnes i am going to play again later at 10am maybe this will help in making myself feel better after the SINFUL SUPPER...heheheh at least i am exercising. Damn gotta go to the stupid NSC to carry on my stupid treatment on my left foot~!! i hate the stupid army and the stupid army boots~~!! Countdown to 8th July ----> 9 days left That will be the day where i leave Singapore for Aus~~!! hehehe to further me studies~~!! wooohooo~~!!! Freedom~~~!! hehehe but somehow i got to make my dad get me a car over there. Will have to crack my brains and think of a reason...Worst Case senario ---> Save up and get one myself lol. which will be totally impossible cause i keep spending money~~!! Damn the stupid Teens magazine, i won some prizes from them and when i go collect them i cannot seems to find the idiot place~~!!! There is no such place as the EPL Building...will have to call them...but somehow the number seems to be not in used~~!! Arrgghhh it is 3 am now..maybe i should get some sleep before my badminton game~~!! hehehe Present Mood ----> Satisfied :)

It is an early and rainny tuesday morning~~!! what am i doing up so early....heh I think i am beginning to be more healthy by sleeping " early " and waking up " early ". Still feeling upset about those beheading incidents, how can a human being do such a thing to another human being!?!? It just dun make sense. Another 9 days before i am off to a bigger place and say sayonara to this tiny island which i call home...heheh...still not feeling very excited about it...we see how i feel when i get back from my badminton game.

I'm not a perfect person As many things I wish I didn't do But I continue learning I never meant to do those things to you And so I have to say before I go That I just want you to know I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new and the reason is you I'm sorry that I hurt you It's something I must live with everyday And all the pain I put you through I wish that I could take it all away And be the one who catches all your tears Thats why i need you to hear I've found a resaon for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new and the reason is You I'm not a perfect person I never meant to do those things to you And so I have to say before I go That I just want you to know I've found a reason for me To change who I used to be A reason to start over new and the reason is you I've found a reason to show A side of me you didn't know A reason for all that I do And the reason is you

urlLink Mt first dish in Aus~~!!! hehehe urlLink

Australia~~!!!! Finally i have time to write my blog after such a long time~~!!! It has been a busy and hectic time for me since i touch down here. So many things had happen i cannot really remember where to start, except for the sweetest thing someone has every done for me.....Drawn me a picture the whole night before i fly....Miss that person dearly right now....hehehehe.... The Chinese Food is australia is terrible~~!! The night i arrived in sdyney i went to eat with my parents some sichuan steam boat....* PUKES * it is absolutely disgusting~~!!! ehehehe Good thing there are some nice chinese restruant in Newcastle where i am studying. It is hard to go anywhere without a car....the freaking bus come ONCE EVERY FREAKING HOUR....hehehehe Cooked 2 time in my hostel when i was in the mood....maybe later i shall upload my master dishes~~!! hehehehee Last night didn't manage to sleep well but was feeling so much better after recieving a sms from my master...that sure brightens up my day~~!!!!... Made quite a few friends here~~!! heheheh There is this ger who is call Jen....who is very sweet and very nice to talk to...but she is very loud hehehehe good thing she is staying above me...There is Brenda too....Pretty looking gal with big eyes and curly eyelashes...ehehe. Then there is Matt the Swedish Good looking guy~~!~~ hehehe man if only i am half of what he is....heheh ok gotta go now not really in the mood to do a full update on the blog...gotta go class soon~~!1 Countdown to going home~~!!! : 5months hahahahah..... Present mood: Not too bad
urlLink Ginnie urlLink
Hmmm where has my baby been~~!!!! * wink wink *
urlLink Number 1 and Number 2 urlLink

Money Money Money~!!! Today is such a happy day cause i finally went to buy my bags for putting my clothes for Aus and Laptop. Number 2 was so very sweet that he actually gave me a farewell gift~~!!! An Addidas Bag~~!!! hehehehe i will put in the pictures later for the addidas bag...Today is a day where i think i have overspent, buying a Jack Wolfskin back 75 litres which i am not sure if it is the real thing, bought a Salomon Blader Cross shirt~!! YAY~~!! Got myself an Addidas jacket, i think you can call me a addidas and salomon freak and i have started to boycott * however it is spelled * Nike. Nike used to be very nice and good but recently their designs have been deproving and not to my liking. heheh Number 1 today put me airplane, say wanna meet me at city hall in the end she ended up sleeping at home hahahaha. F.Y.I: Number 1 and Number 2 are together and they are me classmates in my polytechnic days. Hmmm i wonder how many i have walked in and out the Addidas shop at Suntec, until the guys working there are like " Oooh it is those bunch of people again~~~!! " hahaha They even gave use posters~~!! Hmmmm wonder why are they so nice towards us...* scratch head * Later have to go Zara to look for tie with a friend and maybe just maybe i will buy another pair of jeans. Hehehehe and i am wondering if i should go clubbing with No.1 , No.2 and Big Sis on wed cause my plane leave the next morning at 9.10 am ~~~!!!! aaarrrgggghhhhh....i dun wanna have a hangover on the plane. Damn it is hard to decide~~!! Oooh maybe i should starts to a online photo gallery...Hmmm wonder which one will be good hhehehe. Ok i shall go bath now....can't really remember what happen cause too much happen~~!!! hehehe will continue to post when i remember....Why is my memories so bad...must be getting old~~!! Day left in Singapore: 2 days Present Mood: Super Delightful~~!!!
urlLink MoMo urlLink

AAAaaaaggghhhhh....today is an tiring day...really neh neh sai one~! Woke up early in the morning to meet KC to go collet our 'Lee' Jeans and stupid Eastpak bag. Picked him up at 10am at the mrt...hehehe i think this is the first time he sat my car and i am driving, but as usual there is a "Driving Instructor" next to me telling me to slow down, there is car coming from behind, becareful of the taxi........the list goes on and on. I wun be driving if i never pass my driving test right?? Stupid BiAtch...can never use her blardy head to think...if there is a nagging contest in this world i think she will be champion man~~!! heheheh Ate Jap Eel set to day hehehe very happy because it has been a while since i ate it. Hmmmm i am sure that you have heard of BBQ @ ECP, Pasir Ris, Punggol etc..but have you ever heard of going into malaysia just to BBQ?? hehehehe that is what my dad did today he organised a BBQ at my grandma's place hehehe maybe she wanna see me before i leave or something. Days left before departing for Aus: 4 days This is sad i am going to miss me doggies when i am there...all three of them...i will miss especially MoMo which you can see from the picture that she is totally and absolutely adorable...I will miss playing fetch with her :( Heh Heh Supper is Served~~!!!! Time to go eat me noodle now...Time check: 3:39 am I sure have a habit of sleeping "early" and waking up "early" ehehehehe Present Mood: hungry but Happy
urlLink Tingly and Moi urlLink

Happy happy~~!! Today is a happy day for me~~!! hehehe went to meet Changwen and Yingyi for lunch~~!! YingYi wore a super duper sharp and pointy shoe~~!!! Asked her why she wears that and she reply " TO POKE YOU~~!!! " now now that is a violent woman. hehehehe Bugis Fish and Co~~!! wooohooo...the serving is a little bit too much for me heheh maybe i been eating little lately...but damn the fish and cheap is good man~~!!!! Went Shopping with Changwen then showed him the Addidas Jacket that i liked, was glad to hear him say that the jacket is nice~~!! "Sent" YingYi back to her office...or should i say office block hehehe then continue to Suntec city addidas shop only to find it closed~~!! Damn~~!! make me walk all the way there, luckily city link mall is just near-by and they have a addidas shop.I think i am crazy over addidas stuff now...hehe time to boycott NIKE...The city link mall should have more variety man~~!! all so limited...then we proceed to FNS...ChangWen saw slippers hehehe and he was thinking " to buy or not to buy " hmmmm....he decided that i shall get it for him in aus~~!! Neh bu!!! hehehehe Soon after my "daughter" Tingly, came hehehe same thing again~~!! WEARING THE SUPER DUPER POINTY SHOE~~!!! Asked her why...SAME ANSWER~~!! " TO POKE YOU~!! ". What is it with women and their pointy shoe?? and why the same answer to the same question?? hehehehe...walk back to bugis to get the jacket~~!!! Wee $119 well spent~~!! hehehehe Tingly was hungry but she doesn;t wanna eat too much cause we are meeting my schoolmates for Steamboat BBQ Dinner @ Marina South~~~!!! hahaha. So we went looking for a cafe which was in the directory of the building but somehow we just cannot find it~~!!! and Coffee Bean is close for renovation~~~!!! Ended up in Swensen's....hehehe sinful place~!!! Samsaprilla~~!!! That is the name for what we know as Rootbeer, but some how it taste different. Taste like Sarsi and Rootbeer mixed...weird but nice taste. Shared the Banana boat and Tingly has Caesar's Salad that one with big and HUGE onions which she totally dislike...lalalalala she call here never tell the waitress not to put hahaha...Then we went walking and shopping for earrings when she discover she dropped her earring. I cannot imagaine she is that blur man~~!! if i never borrow a stud to pierce thru my earhole which closed, i think she will be happily window shopping. Both a pair of Square earrings hehe which cost only $4...cheap i would say. Going Window shopping with a girl can be a fun thing, you will see her automatically drift towards a shop which has something that caught her eye. That is what happen to Tingly, we were walking straight then suddenly...she drifted to a pair of slippers~~!! i think the shop is call Xodus or something like that, then she make a impulsive purchased....which she later complain that she shouldn;t have done that...well...Too late my dearest daughter, you already BOUGHT IT. But i would say that it is money well spent cause it is a nice pair of slippers. Dinner was not bad, had fun catching up with my coursemates and they gave me a Jig Saw Puzzle of a photo that we took together~~~!! how Sweet heheheheh....After dinner all of us went to the "Beach" for a leisurely stroll which i had to leave cause i am meeting my friend Brandon for a game of snooker. When we reach the Mrt Station which i will refused to say which one....Tingly says she has to go, then we proceed to the toilet. " Toilet Closed For Washing ". HAHAHAHHAAH there was the sign outside the toilet~~!!! Well in a moment of desperation, Tingly went to the G** Toilet and releived herself but only to find that after she went in a group of guys game in. Ahahaha luckiy i was watching out for her and she only came out when the guys left, howeverthe group of guys were standing outside waiting for frens hahaha...The expressions on their face was lalalalalla...ehehehe...well at least for the whole day there was this super exciting 10.mins adventure. Ok time to sleep now it is 3:51 am now, and i got to meet Mr LinKim Chong to expend the vouchers~~!!! Countdown Days to depart for Aus: 5 days left Present mood: Delighted~~!! Hmmm so this is what my name means E Enchanting U Unusual G Great E Exhausting N Naughty E Entertaining Name / Username: urlLink Name Acronym Generator From urlLink Go-Quiz.com

Missing Someone~~!! I could stay awake just to hear you breathing Watch you smile while you are sleeping While you're far away and dreaming I could spend my life in this sweet surrender I could stay lost in this moment forever Well, every moment spent with you Is a moment I treasure I don't wanna close my eyes I don't wanna fall asleep 'Cause I'd miss you, baby And I don't wanna miss a thing 'Cause even when I dream of you The sweetest dream would never do I'd still miss you, baby And I don't wanna miss a thing Lying close to you Feeling your heart beating And I'm wondering what you're dreaming Wondering if it's me you're seeing Then I kiss your eyes and thank God we're together And I just wanna stay with you In this moment forever, forever and ever I don't wanna close my eyes I don't wanna fall asleep 'Cause I'd miss you, baby And I don't wanna miss a thing 'Cause even when I dream of you The sweetest dream would never do I'd still miss you, baby And I don't wanna miss a thing
